description:
Yeah! A hot mature guy!!! With body hair! Ok, so he's not a bear, but it looks like a nice natural amount. A MAN!
Meet Shawn. He's done a few videos for other sites a few years back (and few newer ones.) and it sounds like he's been a dick dancer too, so he's very gay friendly, and I'm hoping that he will come back and do more with ChaosMen.
When he took his clothes off, I was just amazed at how hot this 33-year-old's body was. Not a bit of fat on him, nicely muscled, but not "too muscley" and I will be danged if his dick didn't grow the minute he took his underwear off. He's was actually a bit embarrassed. It has been a very good month of models who are totally in to showing off.
And he's a nice guy too. We sat and talked for about a half hour after the shoot, and he said he'd be in to an oral video, and maybe go a bit beyond that. Nothing scheduled yet. I've given him all the options - Serviced, Edge, Massage, GloryHole, but I think he is leaning to Serviced.
The longer we talked, the more videos I found out he had done. So I guess he's not as new to the experience as others. But I think I will get him to do an oral thing, and then see if I can mix him with one of the other guys.
title: Shawn - Solo
